project_abstract.cdata: The Second Mangoro Forestry Project components are: (a) establishment of about 18,000 ha of pine and 500 ha of eucalyptus plantations, their maintenance and protection; (b) maintenance and protection of the existing plantations (about 70,000 ha); and the maintenance of roads, buildings and infrastructure in the Project area; (c) the construction and maintenance of roads and buildings; (d) pasture improvement; (e) research and training; and (f) studies for industrial development planning, and preparation of projects in the forestry and agricultural sector.
